name: miniorange/miniorange-oidc
description: Miniorange OIDC/OAuth (SSO) provides SSO/Login to your TYPO3 site with any OpenID/OAuth Provider (ACTIVE SUPPORT for OpenID/OAuth Provider config). It allows users residing at OAuth Provider to login to your TYPO3 website. We support all known OAuth providers â€“ Google Apps, ADFS, Azure AD/ADB2C, Okta, Salesforce, OneLogin, Bitium, WSO2, NetIQ etc.
